channel.title: Michael Urie on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Michael Urie on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Watch Michael Urie Nail His Self-Taped Audition for ‘Shrinking’
item.description: The finely wrought comedic performance, delivered to an empty room, ended up landing the actor his Emmy-nominated role opposite Jason Segel and Harrison Ford.

item.title: Watch Michael Urie Nail His Self-Taped Audition for ‘Shrinking’
item.description: The finely wrought comedic performance, delivered to an empty room, ended up landing the actor his Emmy-nominated role opposite Jason Segel and Harrison Ford.

item.title: Michael Urie on Making a Meal Out of a Monologue on ‘Shrinking’
item.description: Actors love to see a monologue coming. However, a monologue is rarely so nice that you get to do it twice, especially on TV. Leave it to Michael Urie and the AppleTV+ dramedy “Shrinking” team to craft
